name: AccountDetailsPlus
author: Zerebos
description: Lets you view popout, nickname and more from your account panel at the bottom.

name: AlwaysMentionEveryone
author: Lucario
description: Removes* the confirmation prompt when mentioning everyone in a large server.

name: AutoPlayGifs
author: Zerebos
description: Automatically plays animated avatars, emojis, gifs and more.

name: AutoStartRichPresence
author: Lucario
description: Allows you to auto start Rich Presence when you start Discord, with configurable text and images.

name: Badges Everywhere
author: DevilBro
description: Displays Badges (Nitro, Hypesquad, etc...) in the chat/memberlist/userpopout.

name: BDContextMenu
author: Zerebos
description: Adds BD shortcuts to the settings context menu.

name: Better Friend List
author: DevilBro
description: Adds extra controls to the friends page, like sort by name/status, search and all/request/blocked amount.

name: BetterFolders
author: Zerthox
description:
Add new functionality to server folders.

Current Features:
- Custom Folder Icons
- Close other folders on open

name: BetterFormattingRedux
author: Zerebos
description: Lets you format your messages with buttons and adds more formatting options.

name: BetterReplyer
author: Zerthox
description: Reply to people using their ID with a button. Inspired by Replyer by Hammmock#3110, @Natsulus#0001 & @Zerebos#7790.

name: BetterRoleColors
author: Zerebos
description: Adds server-based role colors to typing, voice, popouts, modals and more! This can take the place of ColoredVoice/Typing!

name: BlurNSFW
author: Zerebos
description: Blurs images in NSFW channels until you hover over it.

name: ChannelTabs
author: l0c4lh057
description:
Adds tabs to discord, just like in a normal web browser. Also lets you add bookmarks for certain channels.

**Info:** It seems like discord tells some people to claim their account after enabling the plugin, I have no clue why but will look into it. Just ignore that message, everything should be ok if you do.

name: Char Counter
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a character counter to your textarea, which also displays the amount of selected characters when you select something in the textarea.

name: Complete Timestamps
author: DevilBro
description: Replace all timestamps with complete timestamps.

name: Copy Raw Message
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a entry in the contextmenu when you right click a message that allows you to copy the raw contents of a message.

name: Creation Date
author: DevilBro
description: Displays the Creation Date of an Account in the UserPopout and UserModal.

name: Custom Quoter
author: DevilBro
description: Let's you customize the output of the native quote feature of Discord.

name: DiscordCakeDay
author: Lucario
description: Displays a cake next to the username of anyone whose account is having a Discord birthday! (Currently only displays in chat and member list).

name: Display Servers As Channels
author: DevilBro
description: Display servers in a similar way as channels.

name: DoNotTrack
author: Zerebos
description: Stops Discord from tracking everything you do like Sentry and Analytics.

name: Edit Uploads
author: Qwerasd
description: Provides an edit button on the upload modal which allows you to edit images before uploading them.

name: Edit Users
author: DevilBro
description: Based on Renamer. Allows you to change the icon, name, tag and color of users.

name: EmojiUtilities
author: Zerebos
description: Allows you to blacklist and favorite emojis through the context menu. Favorites and Blacklisted show up as sections in the emoji picker and all emojis in the picker get a context menu to blacklist or favorite them.

name: EmoteSearch
author: Zerebos
description: Search through all emotes in BD with `/es uremotesearch`

name: Emulator
author: Zerthox
description: Emulate Windows, MacOS, Linux or Browser on any platform.  **WARNING**: Emulating a different platform may cause unwanted side effects. Use at own risk.

name: Force Image Preview
author: DevilBro
description: Locally forces embedded Image Previews, if Discord doesn't do it itself.

name: Friend Notifications
author: DevilBro
description: Notifies you when a friend either logs in or out. Click the Online Friend-Counter to display a timelog of the current session.

name: Game Activity Toggle
author: Egrodo
description:
Simple plugin that adds a "Display Game Activity" button on the main toolbar so you can toggle it easier. For when you don't want your friends knowing that you're playing games, but quickly.

This plugin only works on Discord versions 0.0.306 and higher, if it doesn't load please make sure your Discord is updated to the latest version.

name: Google Translate Option
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a Google Translate option to your context menu, which shows a preview of the translated text and on click will open the selected text in Google Translate. Also adds a translation button to your textareas, which will automatically translate the text for you before it is being sent.

name: Hide Channels
author: CapnKitten
description: Allows you to hide the channels list in servers and DMs

name: HideDisabledEmojis
author: Zerebos
description: Hides disabled emojis from the emoji picker. Useful for non-nitro users.

name: HideIconBadge
author: Zerebos
description: Hides the badge that appears on the taskbar icon.

name: HideMutedServers
author: Zerebos
description: Hides muted servers with a context menu option to show/hide. Acts similar to Discord's Hide Muted Channels option.

name: Image Utilities
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a handful of options for images/emotes/avatars (direct download, reverse image search, zoom, copy image link, copy image to clipboard, gallery mode).

name: ImageToClipboard
author: Zerebos
description: Allows you to copy images (png/jpg) directly to your system clipboard. You can do this through the modal or through the context menu.

name: Joined At Date
author: DevilBro
description: Displays the Joined At Date for the current Server of a Member in the UserPopout and UserModal.

name: Last Message Date
author: DevilBro
description: Displays the Date of the last sent Message of a Member for the current Server/DM in the UserPopout and UserModal.

name: LinkChannels
author: Strencher
description: Adds an Icon to channels that copys <#channelId>. Press Shift & Click to insert the channel in the textarea.

name: MemberCount
author: Arashiryuu
description: Displays the total number of members in a guild at the top of the members-list.

name: Message Utilities
author: DevilBro
description: Offers a number of useful message options (quick edit, quick delete, etc.). Remap the keybindings in the settings.

name: MessageTimestampsRedux
author: Arashiryuu
description: Allows you to see a proper timestamp for a message. Simply right-click a message, then click 'Show Timestamp'

name: Minespoiler
author: l0c4lh057
description: Send a game of Minesweeper to your loved ones. Usage: Send a message with the content "minesweeper:(width) (height) (bombCount)" (without brackets and without quotes)

name: MobileForAll
author: Lucario
description: Adds a mobile indicator for all status types, including Idle and Do Not Disturb. Only works in the guild member list for now.

name: Moveable Popups
author: DevilBro
description: Adds the feature to move all popups and modals around like on a normal desktop. Ctrl + drag with your left mousebutton to drag element.

name: Old Title Bar
author: DevilBro
description: Reverts the title bar back to its former self.

name: OnlineFriendCount
author: Zerthox
description: Add the old online friend count back to guild list. Because nostalgia.

name: Open Spotify Links In Spotify
author: Strencher
description: Opens Spotify Links Direktly in Spotify.

name: Owner Tag
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a Tag like Bottags to the Serverowner.

name: PermissionsViewer
author: Zerebos
description: Allows you to view a users permissions.

name: Personal Pins
author: DevilBro
description: Allows you to pin messages in your own personal notebook. Similar to pins you can check the notes of the current channel via the controlbar on the top.

name: Pin DMs
author: DevilBro
description: Allows you to pin DMs, making them appear at the top of your DMs/Guild-list.

name: Quick Mention
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a mention entry to the message option toolbar.

name: Quick Mute Channels
author: Strencher
description: Adds a Speaker to channels to Quickly mute/unmute them.

name: Remove Blocked Messages
author: DevilBro
description: Removes blocked messages completely.

name: Remove Nicknames
author: DevilBro
description: Replace all nicknames with the actual account names.

name: RemoveMinimumSize
author: Zerebos
description: Removes the minimum window size forced by Discord.

name: ResizableCSS
author: Zerebos
description: Allows you to resize the detached CustomCSS window. Useful for development and customization.

name: Reveal All Spoilers Option
author: DevilBro
description: Adds an entry to the message contextmenu to reveal all spoilers within a messageblock.

name: RoleMembers
author: Zerebos
description: Allows you to see the members of each role on a server. Can also see members from a mention.

name: Send Large Messages
author: DevilBro
description: Opens a popout when your message is too large, which allows you to automatically send the message in several smaller messages.

name: SendButton
author: Zerebos
description: Adds a send button to channels where you have the permission to send messages.

name: Server Counter
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a server counter to the server list.

name: Server Details
author: DevilBro
description: Shows details of a server when you hover over the icon in the server list.

name: Server Folders
author: DevilBro
description: Adds the feature to create folders to organize your servers.

name: ServerSearch
author: Zerebos
description: Adds a button to search your servers. Search in place or in popout.

name: Show Hidden Channels
author: DevilBro
description:
Displays all hidden channels that can't be accessed due to role restrictions in a new category.  
***NOTE**: This is only a visual addon and won't gain you access to restricted channels.*

name: ShowAllActivities
author: Strencher
description: See every status a user has enabled. Original made by Juby210#0577.

name: Spell Check
author: DevilBro
description: Adds a spellcheck to all textareas. Select a word inside the textarea and rightclick it to add it to your dictionary.

name: StatusEverywhere
author: Zerebos
description: Adds user status everywhere Discord doesn't.

name: Steam Profile Link
author: DevilBro
description: Opens any Steam links in Steam instead of your internet browser.

name: Timed Light Theme Mode
author: DevilBro
description: Allows you to automatically change light/dark mode depending on the time of day. Slider is added to the 'Appearance' settings.

name: Top Roles Everywhere
author: DevilBro
description: Adds the highest role of a user as a tag. Style can be changed through the plugin settings.

name: TypingIndicator
author: l0c4lh057
description: Shows a typing indicator in the channel and guild list when someone is typing in it.

name: VoiceEvents
author: Zerthox
description: Adds TTS Event Notifications to your selected Voice Channel. Teamspeak feeling.

name: VoiceUsersCounter
author: Strencher
description: Adds a count of users theyre connected to a VoiceChannel. Customize the Color of the count in the SettingsPanel.

name: Word Notifications
author: Qwerasd
description: Get notifications when certain words are said.

name: ZeresPluginLibrary
author: Zerebos
description: Adds a set of utilities for plugins to use. Some plugins require this plugin and will alert you when they do.
